name: grimory
description: Grimório do Guardião - Protocolo de Evolução

scripts.install:all: cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install
scripts.build: cd frontend && npm ci --include=dev && npm run build && cd ../backend && npm ci --include=dev && npm run build
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm run dev"

author: Savio Soares
